docs.title: AlmaLinux M&E Works On Database
docs.text: Welcome! This site lists community-submitted hardware reports for AlmaLinux M&E workflows.

docs.title: How to contribute
docs.text:
1. Run the hardware survey script to generate almalinux_me_report.json.
  2. Open a new hardware report issue in the repo and paste the JSON.
  3. After approval, a report page appears under the Results section.

docs.title: Browse results
docs.text:
Use the site search or your browser's find (Ctrl+F) to locate hardware models quickly.

Report ID Timestamp (UTC) System Processor Memory (GB) GPU 0bc8b9bc 2026-01-30T18:22:32Z AMD Ryzen Threadripper 3970X 32-Core Processor 125 NVIDIA Corporation GA106 [GeForce RTX 3060] (rev a1) d79d017f 2026-01-30T09:27:43Z AMD Ryzen 3 4100 4-Core Processor 62 NVIDIA Corporation GB202 [GeForce RTX 5090] (rev a1)

docs.title: Notes
docs.text: RTX 5090 requires Open version of Nvidia driver AND requires specific versions of Redshift, Houdini etc. to be compatible.
